attributes.action: require licensed premises to provide water free of (or at a reasonable) charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alcohol is an intoxicating, dehydrating drug which can be very dangerous.

Frequent water intake is an essential part of life which our body cannot do without. Alcohol use makes this need more important.

Fortunately, water in this country is both cheap and easily accessible. As a nation we take pride in our good levels of health and well being.

I therefore firmly believe that the requirement for the provision of water should be a compulsory condition in order that an establishment obtains a license to supply alcohol.
